DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the efficacy of amoxicillin-clavulanate in treating acute otitis media in children. The primary end point is time to disappearance of middle ear effusion which monitored by daily tympanometry performed by families and study physicians.
DOC.brief_title: Amoxicillin-clavulanate in Treating Acute Otitis Media Evaluated by Daily Tympanometry
DOC.criteria: Children with acute otitis media Amoxicillin allergy Tympanic membrane perforation Tympanostomy tubes (current) Complication of acute otitis media such as mastoiditis
